title: Baked Pear Crumble

ingredients.text: ¼ cup ; coconut oil, melted ; (50 g)
4 ; ripe pears, such as Bosc, D'Anjou or Barlett
½ cup ; unsweetened shredded coconut ; (50 g)
whipped topping, of choice, for serving
3 tablespoons ; honey, plus more for drizzling

steps.text: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
In a food processor, combine the oats, hazelnuts, walnuts, shredded coconut, cherries, flax seeds, cinnamon, and salt.
Pulse until finely ground.
Add the coconut oil, honey, and vanilla, and pulse until just combined.
The mixture should hold together when squeezed between your fingers.
Cut the pears in half lengthwise.
Using a tablespoon, scoop out the cores.
With a paring knife, cut a “v” shape around the edges of the stem, cutting downward on an angle.
Remove the stems.
Set the pears in a baking dish, cut-side up.
Fill each with ¼ cup (30 grams) of the crumble topping, pressing lightly into the pears.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until the topping is golden brown and the pears are tender when pierced with a paring knife.
Serve immediately, topped with whipped topping and a drizzle of honey, if desired.

description: Fall flavors are in full swing with this baked pear crumble!
fun_facts: Pears are a great source of dietary fiber and vitamin C.
Coconut oil is known for its antibacterial and antifungal properties.
Dried cherries are packed with antioxidants.
tips: Make sure to use ripe pears for the best flavor and texture.
Feel free to substitute the nuts with your favorite variety.
Serve the crumble with a scoop of vanilla ice cream for an extra indulgence.
positive_statement: By making this baked pear crumble, you're treating yourself to a delicious and wholesome dessert!
summary: This cozy dessert features juicy pears baked until tender and caramelized, topped with a crunchy crumble made with oats, nuts, coconut, and dried cherries. Served hot with a dollop of whipped topping, it's a vegan and gluten-free treat that'll make you feel all warm and fuzzy inside!

title: Instant Energy Ginger Citrus Spritz

ingredients.text: 1 ½ cups ; orange juice, freshly squeezed ; (360 mL)
¾ cup ; orange liqueur, such as aperol ; (180 mL)
1 ; fresh ginger, 3 in (7 cm) peeled and finely grated

steps.text: Make the ginger simple syrup: In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the sugar, water, and ginger.
Bring to a low boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes, until the sugar is fully dissolved and the ginger is fragrant.
Remove from heat and let cool for 5-10 minutes.
Strain through a fine-mesh sieve (you should have ⅓ cup (80 ml) syrup).
Fill a 10-cup pitcher halfway with ice.
Pour in the ginger simple syrup, orange juice, and prosecco and stir to combine.
Top with the bitter orange liqueur and club soda.
Fill the pitcher with the orange slices.
Serve immediately.

description: A refreshing and invigorating cocktail made with fresh ginger, orange juice, and prosecco.
fun_facts: Ginger is known for its anti-inflammatory and digestive properties.
Oranges are an excellent source of vitamin C.
Prosecco is a sparkling wine from Italy.
tips: For a non-alcoholic version, simply omit the orange liqueur and prosecco.
Adjust the sweetness by adding more or less sugar to suit your taste.
Garnish with a slice of orange for an extra touch of elegance.
positive_statement: By choosing to make this Instant Energy Ginger Citrus Spritz, you're treating yourself to a refreshing and invigorating cocktail that will surely lift your spirits!
summary: This Instant Energy Ginger Citrus Spritz is a delightful cocktail that combines the zing of fresh ginger, the tanginess of orange juice, and the effervescence of prosecco. With its refreshing and invigorating flavors, this easy-to-make drink is perfect for brunch or summer gatherings. Adjust the sweetness to your liking and garnish with a slice of orange for an elegant touch. Cheers to a delightful and uplifting beverage!

title: Street-Style Butta (India)

steps.text: Blanch the corn in a large pot of boiling water for 3 minutes.
Remove the corn from the pot.
Heat the ghee in a medium pan over medium-high heat.
Add the corn and cook, turning occasionally, until nicely browned on all sides.
Transfer to a serving plate.
Squeeze the lime juice all over the corn.
In a small bowl, combine the chili powder, cumin, cayenne, garam masala, and salt.
Sprinkle all over the corn.

description: Experience the vibrant flavors of India with this Street-Style Butta recipe, perfect for a quick and delicious snack.
fun_facts: Street-style Butta is a popular snack in India, especially in Mumbai.
Corn on the cob is a staple ingredient in Indian street food.
The tangy and spicy masala mix adds a burst of flavor to the charred corn.
tips: Make sure to soak the corn in water before grilling to keep it moist.
Adjust the spice levels according to your preference.
Serve the Street-Style Butta with a squeeze of lime for an extra tangy kick.
positive_statement: By making this Street-Style Butta recipe, you'll be able to enjoy the vibrant flavors of India and transport yourself to the bustling streets of Mumbai.
summary: This Street-Style Butta recipe is a flavorful and easy-to-make Indian street food snack. The juicy corn on the cob is charred to perfection and slathered in a tangy and spicy masala mix. Serve it with a squeeze of lime for an extra burst of flavor. With its vibrant flavors and quick preparation time, this recipe is a must-try for anyone craving a taste of Mumbai street food.

title: Hearty Winter Vegetable Salad With Black Onion Seed Vinaigrette

ingredients.text: Schwartz® ground black pepper, to taste
4 cups ; parsnip, peeled and chopped ; (400 g)
¼ cup ; apple cider vinegar ; (60 mL)
½ lb ; bacon, cooked and crumbled ; (225 g)
¼ cup ; crumbled goat cheese ; (30 g)

steps.text: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C).
Cut up the vegetables and on a baking sheet, toss together the carrots, turnips, parsnips, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Roast the vegetables until crispy and tender, 30-35 minutes.
Make the vinaigrette: In a small pan over medium-high heat, combine the Schwartz Black Onion Seeds and Schwartz Mustard Seeds and toast, stirring continuously, until fragrant, about 3 minutes.
In a blender, combine the toasted spices, salt, mustard, apple cider vinegar, and honey.
Blend on high speed until the spices are fully ground and the mixture is smooth.
With the blender running, slowly drizzle in the olive oil until emulsified.
Transfer the roasted vegetables to a large bowl and pour in ⅓ cup (80 ml) of the dressing.
Toss to coat.
In a separate large bowl, combine the arugula, bacon, and goat cheese.
Drizzle with more dressing to taste, reserving the remaining dressing for another use, and toss to combine.
Add the roasted vegetables and toss again.
Divide between plates and serve.

description: A hearty winter vegetable salad with a flavorful black onion seed vinaigrette, topped with bacon and crumbled goat cheese.
fun_facts: Black onion seeds are also known as kalonji or nigella seeds.
Goat cheese is a good source of protein and calcium.
Mustard seeds are rich in antioxidants and can help improve digestion.
tips: To make this salad vegan, omit the bacon and goat cheese.
You can roast the vegetables ahead of time and assemble the salad just before serving.
For added crunch, sprinkle some toasted nuts or seeds on top of the salad.
positive_statement: By choosing to make this hearty winter vegetable salad, you are treating yourself to a nutritious and delicious meal.
summary: This salad is perfect for a winter meal, with roasted carrots, turnips, and parsnips. The black onion seed vinaigrette adds a unique and aromatic flavor. With its easy preparation and nutritious ingredients, this salad is a great choice for a healthy and satisfying meal.

title: Blueberry Cinnamon Roll Bake

ingredients.text: 2 packages ; cinnamon roll, save the icing

steps.text: Pre-heat oven according to the cinnamon roll package instructions.
Cut cinnamon rolls into bite-size pieces and set aside.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon until well combined.
Place cut up cinnamon rolls into an 8" x 8" (20 cm x 20 cm) baking dish.
Pour blueberries on top followed by the milk mixture.
Bake for 40-45 minutes or until fully cooked.
If the top is looking too brown, cover with foil for the remaining time.
Slice then garnish with icing and serve.

description: Warm and gooey cinnamon roll chunks are mixed with juicy blueberries, baked to perfection for a mouth-watering breakfast or dessert.
fun_facts: Blueberries are packed with antioxidants and are known to improve brain function.
Cinnamon has been used for centuries for its medicinal properties.
Vanilla extract is derived from the vanilla bean and adds a sweet and aromatic flavor to dishes.
tips: Make sure to evenly distribute the blueberries throughout the mixture for a burst of flavor in every bite.
Serve the Blueberry Cinnamon Roll Bake warm with a drizzle of icing for an extra touch of sweetness.
You can prepare the dish the night before and refrigerate it, then simply bake it in the morning for a hassle-free breakfast.
positive_statement: By making this Blueberry Cinnamon Roll Bake, you'll treat yourself to a delicious and comforting dish that will surely impress your family and friends.
summary: This Blueberry Cinnamon Roll Bake is a delightful dish that combines the flavors of cinnamon rolls and blueberries. With its easy preparation and delicious outcome, it is perfect for both breakfast and dessert. The recipe consists of vanilla, cinnamon roll chunks, cinnamon, eggs, blueberries, and milk. Serve it warm with a drizzle of icing for an extra touch of sweetness. Enjoy the burst of flavor from the blueberries in every bite. This recipe has 9 steps and can be prepared in no time.

title: Hainanese Chicken Rice

ingredients.text: 3 lb ; whole chicken, giblets removed ; (1.3 kg)
1 gal ; cold water, plus more as needed ; (3.7 L)
2 cups ; long grain rice, rinsed and drained ; (400 g)

steps.text: To clean the chicken, rub all over with a handful of kosher salt, getting rid of any loose skin.
Rinse the chicken well inside and out.
Pat dry with paper towels.
Remove any excess fat from the chicken and set aside for later.
Season the chicken generously with salt.
Stuff the chicken cavity with the ginger slices and scallions.
Place the chicken in a large stock pot, cover with cold water by 1 inch (2 cm), and season with salt to taste.
Bring to a boil over high heat, then immediately reduce the heat to low to maintain a simmer.
Cover and cook for about 30 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165°F (75°C).
Remove the pot from the heat.
Remove the chicken from the pot, reserving the poaching liquid for later, and transfer to an ice bath for 5 minutes to stop the cooking process and to keep the chicken skin springy.
Discard the ginger and green onion.
After it’s cooled, pat the chicken dry with paper towels and rub all over with sesame oil.
This will help prevent the chicken from drying out.
In a large wok or skillet, heat ¼ cup (60 ml) of sesame oil over medium-high heat.
Add 2 tablespoons of reserved chopped chicken fat, the garlic, ginger, and salt, and fry until aromatic, about 10 minutes.
Reserve ¼ of the fried garlic mixture, then add the rice to the remaining fried garlic and stir to coat.
Cook for 3 minutes.
Transfer the rice to a rice cooker and add 2 cups (480 ml) of reserved poaching broth.
Steam the rice for 60 minutes, or until tender.
While the rice is cooking, carve the chicken for serving.
Make the chili sauce: combine the sambal, Sriracha, sugar, garlic, ginger, lime juice, and chicken broth in a small bowl and stir to incorporate.
Make the ginger garlic sauce: in a small bowl, combine the ginger, garlic, salt, peanut oil, and rice vinegar, and stir to incorporate.
Make the soy sauce: in a small bowl, combine the reserved fried garlic and ginger with the oyster sauce, dark soy sauce, light soy sauce, and chicken broth, and stir to incorporate.
Serve the sliced chicken with the rice, dipping sauces, sliced cucumbers, and fresh cilantro

description: Hainanese chicken rice is a comforting, one-pot dish featuring tender poached chicken and fragrant rice cooked in chicken broth.
fun_facts: Hainanese chicken rice is considered the national dish of Singapore.
The dish originated from Hainan, a province in southern China.
Hainanese chicken rice is often served with a side of chicken broth or soup.
tips: To achieve tender and juicy chicken, poach it gently over low heat.
Use the reserved chicken poaching broth to cook the rice for added flavor.
Serve the chicken rice with a variety of condiments like sambal, soy sauce, and lime juice.
positive_statement: By choosing to make Hainanese chicken rice, you'll be treating yourself to a comforting and flavorful dish that is loved by many.
summary: Hainanese Chicken Rice is a popular Asian comfort food dish that consists of tender poached chicken and fragrant rice cooked in chicken broth. This easy recipe is perfect for any occasion and is loved for its delicious flavors. With its simple steps and common ingredients like fresh ginger and garlic, you can easily recreate this dish at home. Serve it with a variety of condiments like sambal, soy sauce, and lime juice for an extra burst of flavor. Enjoy this comforting and satisfying meal that is sure to impress!

title: Easy Vegan Pasta Salad

ingredients.text: ¼ cup ; red wine vinegar ; (60 mL)
15 oz ; chickpeas, 1 can, drained and rinsed ; (425 g)
½ cup ; red onion, sliced ; (75 g)

steps.text: In a large mixing bowl, combine pasta, chickpeas, grape tomatoes, broccoli, carrots, red onion, and parsley.
In a small liquid measuring cup, combine olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper, and whisk to combine.
Pour dressing over pasta salad and stir until evenly distributed.
Transfer pasta salad into 4 containers and refrigerate for up to 5 days.

description: This colorful and delicious pasta salad is packed with veggies, herbs, and a tangy dressing, making it the perfect lunch or side dish for any occasion.
fun_facts: Pasta salads are believed to have originated in the United States in the early 20th century.
Pasta salads are a popular dish for picnics and potlucks.
Pasta salads can be served cold or at room temperature.
tips: To save time, you can use pre-cooked pasta for this recipe.
Feel free to customize this salad by adding your favorite vegetables or herbs.
This pasta salad can be made ahead of time and stored in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
positive_statement: By choosing to make this easy vegan pasta salad, you are making a healthy and delicious choice that is packed with nutrients and flavor.
summary: This easy vegan pasta salad is a flavorful and nutritious option for lunch or as a side dish. With its colorful mix of veggies, herbs, and tangy dressing, it's sure to be a hit. You can customize it with your favorite vegetables and herbs, and it can be made ahead of time for convenience. Enjoy this refreshing and satisfying salad!

title: Healthy Caramel Apple Bites

ingredients.text: topping of your choice, if desired

steps.text: In a small bowl, pour the hot water over the dates.
Allow the dates to soak for 10-15 mins.
This makes them easier to blend.
Add the date and the water to a food processor and blend until smooth.
NOTE: If your date puree is looking thick and chunky, add a few splashes of water while the food processor is running until the mixture thins out.
Add the date mixture to a sauce pan over medium-low heat.
Add the almond milk, vanilla extract, and salt, and mix to combine.
Stir often for 8-10 minutes until thick.
Use a melon baller to scoop out apple balls.
While the caramel cools, stick the apple balls onto the popsicle sticks.
Dip the apple sticks into the caramel, roll in toppings (if desired), and allow to set in the fridge for 30 minutes.

description: These date caramel apple bites are a healthy and delicious way to satisfy your sweet tooth.
fun_facts: Dates are a great natural sweetener and provide essential nutrients like fiber and potassium.
Almond butter is a good source of healthy fats and protein.
Apples are rich in antioxidants and can help improve digestion.
tips: Soak the dates in warm water for a few minutes to soften them before making the caramel.
Use a melon baller or small cookie cutter to create perfectly round apple bites.
Drizzle melted dark chocolate over the apple bites for an extra indulgent touch.
positive_statement: By choosing to make these healthy caramel apple bites, you're treating yourself to a delicious and nutritious snack.
summary: These healthy caramel apple bites are a perfect fall treat. Made with fresh apples, creamy almond butter, and gooey date caramel, they are easy to make and suitable for vegan and gluten-free diets. Soak the dates to soften them, use a melon baller for perfectly round bites, and consider adding a drizzle of melted dark chocolate for an extra indulgence.

title: One-Pan Honey Garlic Salmon & Asparagus

steps.text: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Add the asparagus onto a baking tray and coat with olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic.
Place salmon fillets in the middle of the baking tray.
In a small bowl, add the olive oil, honey, and garlic.
Mix until well combined.
Coat salmon with mixture.
Bake for 12-15 minutes.
Serve now or refrigerate in airtight container up to 3-4 days.

description: This easy and delicious one-pan meal features flaky salmon, tender asparagus, and a sweet and savory honey garlic sauce.
fun_facts: Salmon is a great source of omega-3 fatty acids, which are beneficial for heart health.
Asparagus is packed with vitamins A, C, and K, as well as fiber and antioxidants.
Honey has natural antibacterial properties and can help soothe a sore throat.
tips: To prevent the salmon from sticking to the pan, make sure it is well-coated with olive oil.
For a caramelized finish, broil the dish for a few minutes at the end.
Serve with a side of rice or quinoa for a complete meal.
positive_statement: By choosing to make this one-pan honey garlic salmon & asparagus, you're treating yourself to a flavorful and nutritious meal!

title: Hazelnut Milk

steps.text: In a medium bowl, soak raw hazelnuts in 2 cups (475 ml) of water overnight.
Drain the bowl of water and place the hazelnuts in a blender.
Add 1 tablespoon vanilla, 2 tablespoons honey, 2 tablespoons unsweetened cacao powder, 1 pinch of salt, and 4 cups (945 ml) of water to the blender.
Blend the mixture on high for 90 seconds.
Use a cheesecloth to strain the liquid into a pouring container.
(Optional) refrigerate 1-2 hours or serve immediately.

description: Creamy Hazelnut Milk, a delightful alternative to dairy, perfect for sipping or adding a nutty twist to your recipes.
fun_facts: Hazelnuts are a good source of healthy fats and vitamin E.
Hazelnut milk is a popular dairy alternative for those with lactose intolerance.
Hazelnuts are also known as filberts.
tips: Soak the hazelnuts overnight for a smoother milk.
Adjust the sweetness by adding more or less honey.
Use a nut milk bag or cheesecloth to strain the milk for a smoother texture.
positive_statement: By choosing to make this Hazelnut Milk, you're opting for a delicious and nutritious dairy-free option!
summary: This creamy Hazelnut Milk recipe is rated highly by users and consists of 7 simple steps. With raw hazelnuts, honey, water, salt, vanilla extract, and unsweetened cocoa powder, it's an easy and delicious dairy-free option. title: Sweet & Sour Pork

ingredients.text: 8 oz ; chopped pineapple with syrup ; (225 g)
2 lb ; pork shoulder, or pork butt ; (910 g)
2 tablespoons ; vegetable oil, plus more for frying

steps.text: Cut pork into bite-sized pieces and place in a medium-sized bowl.
Season with pepper and add soy sauce, garlic, and green onion.
Cover and let marinate for 1-2 hours.
Coat pork pieces with egg, dip in cornstarch, and fry until crispy and golden (about 2 minutes).
Drain on paper towels.
Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the onion and bell pepper.
Once the vegetables start to become tender, add pineapple with syrup.
Stir for 30 seconds before adding vinegar, soy sauce, ketchup, and sugar.
Stir regularly over medium-high heat for 3-4 minutes as water evaporates and sauce thickens.
Add the pork to the pan once the sauce begins to thicken.
Stir to coat evenly.
Garnish with additional green onions and a sprinkle of sesame seeds.

description: Get ready for a flavor explosion with this sweet and sour pork recipe!
fun_facts: Sweet and sour pork is a popular Chinese dish that originated in the Guangdong province.
The combination of sweet and sour flavors is believed to stimulate the appetite and aid digestion.
Sweet and sour pork is often served with steamed rice or noodles.
tips: For extra crispy pork, marinate it in a mixture of soy sauce and cornstarch before cooking.
To make the sauce thicker, mix cornstarch with water and add it to the pan.
If you prefer a spicier dish, add some chili flakes or hot sauce to the sauce mixture.
positive_statement: By choosing to make this sweet and sour pork recipe, you're in for a delicious and flavorful meal that will satisfy your taste buds!
summary: This sweet and sour pork recipe is a classic Chinese dish that combines juicy pieces of pork with a tangy sauce, peppers, and pineapple. It's an easy recipe that can be enjoyed with steamed rice or noodles. With its perfect balance of sweet and savory flavors, it's sure to be a hit at your next meal!

title: Cheddar-Stuffed Cheddar Biscuits

steps.text: Combine bisquick and butter together until you have a crumbly mix.
Add milk, dried parsley and shredded cheddar.
The dough will be sticky.
Take a handful of dough, flatten, place a cube of cheese in the middle and roll the dough around the cube of cheese.
Place on a parchment lined baking sheet and bake for 45 minutes at 450°F (232°C)
While the biscuits are baking, make the butter topping.
Melt the butter and add in the garlic powder and old bay seasoning.
Once the biscuits are done baking, brush the butter topping over each biscuit.

description: Bite into these heavenly cheddar-stuffed cheddar biscuits for a cheesy explosion in every mouthful.

For extra cheesiness, sprinkle some shredded cheddar on top of the biscuits before baking.

title: Pico De Gallo

steps.text: Combine tomatoes, onion, jalapeño, garlic, cilantro, salt, pepper, and lime juice in a small bowl and stir.
Transfer to an airtight container and store in the fridge up to 6 days.

title: “Ranch” Roasted Chickpeas

ingredients.text: 15 oz ; chickpeas, 1 can, drained and rinsed ; (400 g)

steps.text: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Carefully dry the chickpeas.
Removing the skins is optional and they will come off easily.
The drier you get them, the crunchier they’ll be!
In a medium bowl, add dried chickpeas, olive oil, thyme, parsley, onion, dill, garlic powder and pepper.
Toss well to coat evenly.
Spread chickpeas out on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
Roast for 15-20 minutes.
Mix around on baking sheet and roast for additional 15-20 minutes, or until golden.
Cool for 5-10 minutes.

description: Make your next batch of roasted chickpeas irresistible with the savory flavors of ranch seasoning.
fun_facts: Ranch seasoning was first created by a plumber in Alaska in the 1950s.

Store any leftovers in an airtight container to maintain their crunchiness.
Feel free to adjust the amount of ranch seasoning to suit your taste preferences.

title: Going Solo: 2 Crepe Crepe-Cakes

steps.text: In a bowl, whisk together the strawberries and double cream until they reach soft peaks.
Sieve the flour and cocoa powder into a bowl.
Crack an egg in the middle and add the melted butter.
Whisk until combined.
Slowly add the milk in three batches, whisking until perfectly smooth.
Heat a small amount of butter over low heat in a nonstick frying pan.
Pour in half of the mixture and swirl around until the pan is fully covered.
When you can see bubbles forming underneath the crepe, flip.
Cook until the edges start to look dry and crisp.
Repeat cooking steps with the remaining mixture and set aside to cool.
Spread the strawberry cream onto one crepe and chocolate hazelnut spread on the other.
Put the chocolate crepe on top of the strawberry one.
Cut into 8 slices with a pizza cutter.
Layer them on top of each other.
Serve with strawberries and crushed hazelnuts.

description: This delicate and elegant dessert is a feast for the eyes and the taste buds.
fun_facts: Crepes originated in France and are a popular dessert worldwide.

tips: Make sure to let the crepe batter rest for at least 30 minutes to ensure a smooth and tender texture.
Use a non-stick pan or crepe maker for easy flipping and cooking of the crepes.
Gently fold the whipped cream into the crepe batter to maintain its light and fluffy texture.
positive_statement: By making these crepe crepe-cakes, you'll impress yourself with your culinary skills and create a stunning dessert that will delight your taste buds.

title: Tofu Scramble

steps.text: Drain tofu from container, wrap it in a paper towel, and place it on a plate.
Rest another plate on top of the tofu and microwave for 3-5 minutes.
Unwrap the tofu and cut into cubes.
Place the tofu in a bowl and mash with a fork.
Cut the top off a bell pepper and remove all the seeds and thinly slice.
Chop the onion.
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add the onions and peppers, and cook until softened.
Add in the tofu and cook on medium heat until most of the water has evaporated.
Add the salt, pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, and cumin, and mix well, until all the seasonings are evenly distributed.
Add the lemon juice to the tofu and mix until evenly combined.
Remove the tofu from the heat and serve.

description: Whip up a protein-packed, plant-based breakfast with this scrumptious Tofu Scramble recipe.

Turmeric, a key ingredient in this recipe, has anti-inflammatory properties.
Bell peppers are rich in vitamin C and antioxidants.
tips: Press the tofu to remove excess moisture before cooking for a firmer texture.
Add nutritional yeast for a cheesy flavor.
Serve with avocado slices for added creaminess.
positive_statement: By choosing to make this Tofu Scramble, you're starting your day with a delicious and nutritious plant-based breakfast!
summary: This Tofu Scramble recipe is a flavorful and nutritious way to start your day. title: Yogurt Granola Frozen Banana

steps.text: Cut the bananas in half horizontally.
Insert popsicle sticks in the middle of the banana halves.
Transfer bananas to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet, and freeze until solid.
In a tall glass or mixing cup, add Greek yogurt and almond milk, and mix together.
If the texture is too thick, add more almond milk until the coating is silky.
Place granola onto a plate.
Dip the bananas into the yogurt coating, then roll or sprinkle on toppings.
Place bananas in freezer until the coating has hardened.

description: Say hello to a refreshing and nutritious treat with this Yogurt Granola Frozen Banana recipe!
fun_facts: Frozen bananas are a great source of potassium.

title: Açaí Meringue Cookies

ingredients.text: ½ cup ; acai puree, or berry puree ; (115 mL)
1 tablespoon ; acai syrup, or berry syrup

steps.text: In a saucepan, boil ½ cup (100 g) sugar, water, and acai puree.
Reduce heat to simmer and cook until mixture thickens into a syrup.
Add lemon when thickening.
Let cool before using.
Preheat oven to 225˚F (105˚C).
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set aside.
In a bowl, using an electric mixer, beat the egg whites until they are foamy.
Add salt and lemon juice.
Continue whisking.
Slowly add sugar while whisking and beat until glossy, stiff peaks form.
Spoon meringue mixture on the parchment sheet and smooth the top of the meringue with the back of the spoon.
Drizzle about ¼ teaspoon of acai syrup on the meringue and swirl with a toothpick.
Repeat for each cookie.
Bake for 90 minutes, until the outside shell becomes stiff and the meringue has gone from shiny to matte.
The cookie should easily lift off the parchment.

description: Crispy, light, and full of flavor, these Açaí Meringue Cookies are made with whipped egg whites, sugar, and acai powder.
fun_facts: Acai berries are considered a superfood due to their high antioxidant content.
Meringue cookies are naturally gluten-free and dairy-free.
Acai powder is made from freeze-dried acai berries, preserving their nutrients.
tips: Make sure to whip the egg whites until stiff peaks form for the best texture.
Use a piping bag to create uniform shapes for the cookies.
Store the cookies in an airtight container to maintain their crispiness.

title: Vegan Crab Cakes

ingredients.text: 1 ½ cups ; panko breadcrumbs, divided ; (75 g)
15 oz ; artichoke heart, drained and rinsed ; (425 g)
¾ cup ; vegan mayonnaise, divided ; (170 g)
15 oz ; chickpeas, drained and rinsed, 1 can ; (425 g)
15 oz ; hearts of palm, drained, rinsed and cut into large chunks, 1 can ; (425 g)

steps.text: Add chickpeas, hearts of palm, and artichoke hearts to food processor.
Pulse until mixture is chopped, yet still slightly chunky.
Transfer mixture to large mixing bowl and add 1 cup (50 g) of bread crumbs, ¼ cup (55 g) vegan mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, salt, pepper, and Old Bay seasoning.
Mix well.
Form the mixture into 6 1-inch (2 ½ cm) thick patties.
Dip each patty in remaining bread crumbs.
Heat a pan of oil to 350˚F (180˚C).
Fry each patty for 3-6 minutes per side, until golden brown.
Transfer to paper towel-lined plate to absorb excess oil.
For tartar sauce, combine remaining vegan mayo, relish, and 1 teaspoon lemon juice in mixing bowl.
Top the patties with tartar sauce, dill, and lemon juice.

title: Croquette Mozzarella Sticks

ingredients.text: 2 tablespoons ; fresh flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped
½ cup ; grated parmesan cheese, plus more for garnish ; (55 g)
2 lb ; russet potato, peeled and quartered ; (910 g)

steps.text: Add the potatoes to a large pot with enough cold water to cover them.
Bring to a boil over high heat and cook until tender when pierced with a fork, about 30 minutes.
Drain the potatoes and transfer to a large bowl.
Use a potato masher to mash the potatoes until there are no large chunks left.
Add the garlic, parsley, Parmesan cheese, 1 beaten egg, salt, and pepper.
Mix well.
Take a spoonful of potatoes and form into a patty.
Place a cheese stick in the middle and wrap the potato around the cheese until it is evenly covered.
Arrange the formed croquettes on a parchment-lined baking sheet and freeze for 30 minutes.
Place the flour, 3 remaining eggs, and bread crumbs in 3 separate shallow bowls.
Dredge the croquettes in the flour, shaking off any excess; then dredge in the egg and the bread crumbs.
Heat the oil in a large pot until it reaches 350°F (180°C).
Fry the croquettes for 3 minutes, or until golden brown.
Transfer the croquettes to a wire rack set over paper towels to drain the excess oil.
Let cool for a few minutes as they will be HOT.
Garnish with grated Parmesan cheese and parsley and serve with marinara sauce alongside.

description: A combination of two classic appetizers, these croquettes are filled with gooey melted mozzarella cheese and coated in breadcrumbs before being fried until crispy.
fun_facts: Croquettes originated in France and are typically made with a mixture of mashed potatoes and meat or cheese.
Mozzarella cheese is known for its stretchy texture when melted.
Breadcrumbs help to create a crispy coating on the outside of the croquettes.
tips: Make sure to fully coat the mozzarella sticks in breadcrumbs to ensure a crispy exterior.
Allow the croquettes to cool slightly before serving to avoid burning your mouth on the hot melted cheese.
Serve the croquettes with marinara sauce for dipping.

title: Mirror Glaze

ingredients.text: 26 oz ; white chocolate, chopped, over 30% cocoa butter ; (735 g)
14 oz ; sweetened condensed milk, 1 can ; (395 g)

steps.text: Boil the water, sugar, and condensed milk in a pot for 1 minute, then remove from heat.
Bloom the gelatin sheets in 8 cups (2 liters) of cold water for 5 minutes, then wring the gelatin sheets of excess water and mix into the sugar mixture.
Pour the liquid over the chocolate, letting it sit for 2-3 minutes to allow the chocolate to soften.
Using an immersion blender, carefully blend the chocolate and the liquid, making sure that you are not blending in air bubbles by lifting up the blender too high.
It’s okay to go slow, just make sure it’s all blended with as little bubbles as possible, which will show up in the final product.
Sieve the mix into a large jug or vertical container to remove any excess bubbles.
If there are still bubbles, continue to sieve back and forth.
A trick to remove air bubbles from the surface is to manually pop them with a toothpick or to press cling film into the surface and remove the bubbles.
Separate the glaze into different containers and color them to your desire.
We used red and white for this cake.

Blend the coloring with the glaze until the color is distributed evenly, then cover each container with the cling film, pressing the film into the glaze to ensure that there is no skin when you are ready to use the glaze.
When you are ready to use the glaze, make sure each one is around 90-96°F, then pour the colored glazes back into one container.
Swirl them if you’d like, then glaze your cake!

description: Learn how to make a stunning mirror glaze using white chocolate, sweetened condensed milk, gel food coloring, water, sugar, and gelatin sheets.
fun_facts: Mirror glaze is also known as mirror cake glaze or glaçage miroir.
Mirror glaze is a shiny, reflective glaze that is poured over cakes and pastries.
Mirror glaze is popular for creating a stunning, glossy finish on desserts.
tips: Make sure to use gel food coloring for vibrant and intense colors in the mirror glaze.
Soak the gelatin sheets in cold water for a few minutes before using them in the recipe.
Allow the mirror glaze to cool slightly before pouring it over the cake for the best results.
positive_statement: By making this mirror glaze, you will impress your guests with a beautifully glossy and professional-looking dessert.
summary: This mirror glaze recipe uses white chocolate, sweetened condensed milk, gel food coloring, water, sugar, and gelatin sheets. It has a rating of 5 stars and consists of 13 steps. Impress your guests with a beautifully glossy and professional-looking dessert by making this mirror glaze.

title: One-pot Lemon Pepper Chicken & Rice

ingredients.text: 2 lb ; chicken thighs with skin ; (910 g)
¼ cup ; fresh parsley, optional ; (10 g)

steps.text: Preheat your oven to 350˚F (175˚C).
Combine lemon pepper, paprika, and 2 cloves of minced garlic in a small bowl.
In a large oven-proof pot, heat olive oil on medium heat.
Season both sides of the chicken and place in the pot skin side down.
Cook for three minutes, turn the heat up to medium high and cook for an additional two minutes (or until browned).
Turn the chicken over and cook for another 3-4 minutes.
Remove chicken from the pot and set aside.
(Don’t worry!
It will finish cooking when you put it in the oven.)
With a paper towel, carefully wipe out excess fat, leaving the seasoning.
On medium high, melt two Tbsp.
of butter in the pot and add the diced onions and the rest of the minced garlic.
Cook until onions are translucent (1-2 minutes).
Add the rice and stir until it becomes translucent (1-2 minutes).
Pour in the white wine and let it cook until most of the wine has evaporated (about two minutes).
Add the chicken broth, one cup of milk, and a dash of pepper and stir.
Bring it to a simmer.
Place the chicken back into the pot.
Cover with a lid or foil and bake for 30 minutes (remove lid after 20 minutes).
Remove the chicken from the pot and broil on high for 2-3 minutes or until the skin has nicely browned.
Add the other two Tbsp.
butter, parmesan, ½ cup (118 ml) of milk and parsley to the rice.
Stir until well combined.
Return the chicken on top of the rice.

description: This easy one-pot meal is a perfect weeknight dinner, featuring tender and juicy chicken thighs, tender arborio rice, and creamy parmesan sauce.
fun_facts: Arborio rice is a type of short-grain rice that is commonly used in risotto.

tips: To make this recipe healthier, you can use boneless, skinless chicken thighs instead of chicken thighs with skin.

You can customize the flavor of this dish by adding your favorite herbs and spices, such as thyme or garlic powder.

title: Elegant Braised Lamb Shank Dinner

ingredients.text: 3 lb ; yukon gold potato, peeled, chopped, and boiled ; (1.3 kg)
6 lb ; lamb shanks, 1 pound (455 g) each ; (2.7 kg)
2 ; medium carrots, minced, plus 1 pound (455 grams) oblique-cut
1 lb ; red pearl onion, peeled ; (455 g)
freshly ground black pepper, to taste
¼ cup ; fresh parsley, chopped ; (10 g)
½ cup ; unsalted butter, 1 stick, cubed and chilled ; (115 g)

steps.text: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Season the lamb shanks all over with salt and pepper.
Heat the canola oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Sear 2 lamb shanks at a time until a dark brown crust forms on one side, 3-5 minutes.
Sear the other sides of the meat until evenly browned.
Remove the shanks from the pan and set aside.
Remove all but 2 tablespoons of fat from the pan.
Add the minced carrots, onion, celery, and minced garlic to the pot.
Season with salt and pepper, and cook until the vegetables are deeply caramelized, 15-20 minutes.
Add the tomato paste and cook until it browns and is aromatic, 5 minutes.
Add the red wine and scrape the bottom of the pot to release the flavorful browned bits stuck to the bottom.
Cook until the wine reduces by half and thickens slightly, 3 minutes.
Add the chicken stock, orange juice, lemon juice, rosemary, thyme, and bay leaves.
Stir and bring to a boil.
Return the lamb shanks to the Dutch oven, cover, and place in the oven for 2 hours, turning the shanks halfway through, until the lamb is tender and the braising liquid has thickened.
About halfway through the lamb cooking time, add the oblique-cut carrots, Brussels sprouts, red pearl onions, and whole garlic cloves to a baking sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Toss to combine.
Roast in the oven for 1 hour, or until the vegetables are tender.
Right after the potatoes finish boiling, drain and transfer to a large bowl.
Season with plenty of salt and a bit of white pepper, and mash the potatoes until as smooth as possible.
Fold in the butter, sour cream, and heavy cream until smooth and light.
Make the citrus gremolata: In a small bowl, combine the parsley, lemon zest, flaky salt, garlic, chives, horseradish, and orange zest.
To serve, scoop mashed potatoes onto a plate.
Add roasted vegetables and a lamb shank.
Top with the braising liquid and citrus gremolata.

title: Avocado Carbonara

steps.text: Blend avocado, egg yolk, garlic, and lemon juice in a powerful blender or food processor.
Pulse to blend and add heavy cream gradually.
Blend the sauce until smooth and set aside.
Cut up strips of bacon and cook in a large pan.
Set aside.
In a large pot, bring water to a boil and cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.

title: Breakfast Sandwich Meal Prep

ingredients.text: ¾ cup ; milk, of your preference ; (180 mL)
4 slices ; deli meat, of your preference
2 slices ; turkey bacon, or of your preference, cut in half

steps.text: Preheat oven to 375ºF (190ºC).
Spray a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) baking dish with cooking spray.
In the baking dish, whisk the eggs, milk, salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Mix in broccoli, red onion, and bell pepper.
Bake until the top starts to get golden brown, about 25 minutes.
Place the deli meat and bacon on a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) nonstick sheet pan.
Bake 5-10 minutes, or until they reach desired doneness.
Arrange the sliced English muffins on another sheet pan.
Broil for 5-10 minutes, or until they reach desired doneness.
Once your eggs cool, slice into 6 squares.
Cut your parchment paper into 8x8-inch (20x20 cm) squares for each breakfast sandwich.
Lay a moistened paper towel across the parchment and assemble your breakfast sandwiches.
Wrap the assembled sandwich in the moist paper towel first, to ensure freezer freshness and even cooking when microwaved.
Wrap in parchment and label.
Store in an airtight plastic bag or container up to one month in the freezer.
When ready to eat, remove the parchment paper and microwave on high for 2-3 minutes.
Allow to cool.

Slice each avocado in half, then into wedges.
Scoop out of the peel.
Mix panko breadcrumbs with salt and cayenne.
Dip each avocado wedge in flour, then eggs, then panko, then place on a parchment-lined baking sheet.

title: Strawberry Lemonade Pie

ingredients.text: 1 teaspoon ; pink himalayan salt, plus a pinch, divided
3 cups ; whole wheat pastry flour, plus more for dusting ; (390 g)
2 tablespoons ; cornstarch, dissolved in 1 tablespoon water
¾ cup ; unsalted butter, 1 1/2 sticks, cubed and chilled ; (170 g)

steps.text: In a food processor, combine the flour, freeze-dried strawberries, sugar, and 1 teaspoon of salt.
Pulse until the strawberries are fully incorporated into the flour.
Add the butter and pulse until it breaks down into pea-sized pieces.
Do not over-mix.
Add the ice water 1 tablespoon at a time, pulsing between each addition, until the dough just holds together.
Transfer the dough to a clean work surface and divide into 2 discs, one slightly larger than the other.
Cover with plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator while you prepare the filling.
In a medium pot over medium heat, combine the sliced strawberries, lemon curd, and a pinch of salt.
Bring to a light boil, stirring occasionally.
Add the cornstarch slurry and simmer for 5-10 minutes, or until the filling thickens.
Remove from the heat and let cool.
Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
Remove the larger disc of dough from the fridge and sprinkle with flour.
Roll out to about ⅛ inch (3 mm) thick and transfer to a greased 9½-inch (24-cm) pie dish, pressing down to form the bottom crust.
Cut off any excess dough around the edges and set aside.
Chill the bottom crust while you roll out the top.
Roll out the smaller dough disc.
Cut 6 1-inch-wide (2-cm) strips from the dough and place on a parchment-lined baking sheet.
Combine all of the excess dough, re-roll it, and use a cookie cutter to cut out shapes of your choosing.
Add to the baking sheet and chill the strips and shapes for 5 minutes.
Remove the bottom crust from the fridge and poke holes all over the bottom with a fork.
Pour the strawberry filling into the crust.
Lay 3 of the dough strips vertically and evenly spaced across the top of the pie, and lay the other 3 horizontally.
Place a cutout shape at the intersection of every vertical and horizontal strip.
Trim the edges of the dough, then crimp with a fork all the way around.
Brush the crust with the beaten egg, then sprinkle with turbinado sugar.
Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown.
Let cool, then chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve.

description: Enjoy the refreshing flavors of strawberry and lemonade in this delightful pie.

tips: To make the pie crust flaky, make sure the butter is cold and cut into small pieces.

steps.text: To an 8-inch (20 cm) microwave-safe pie dish, add the green beans and cream of mushroom soup, then sprinkle the fried onions evenly over the top.
Microwave for 5 minutes at half power until onions have become a little crispy.
Top with scallions and serve warm.

title: Upside-Down Apple Cake

ingredients.text: 4 ; apples, peeled and cut into ¼-inch (6.3mm) thick slices, recommended: granny smith or pink lady

steps.text: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C) and grease a 9” (23cm) cake pan.
In a bowl, cream together the butter and sugar.
Whisk in the eggs, vanilla and milk until fully incorporated.
Add the flour, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon.
Whisk until combined.
For the sauce, melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat, and stir in the brown sugar.
Bring to a boil and continue to stir for 30 seconds, or until vigorously bubbling.
Pour the sauce into the greased cake pan.
Arrange the apples on top of the sauce in a circular pattern.
Pour cake batter on top of apples and smooth the top of the batter.
Bake for 45-55 minutes, or until the cake is done (the top will spring back when gently poked).
Cool for 10-15 minutes and loosen the sides of the cake by running a butter knife around the edge.
Place a plate upside down on top of the pan, then invert the pan, flipping the cake onto the plate.

title: Show-Stopping Beef Wellington

ingredients.text: 3 lb ; center-cut beef tenderloin ; (1 ½ kg)
½ lb ; prosciutto, thinly sliced, or ham ; (225 g)

steps.text: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Let the beef tenderloin come to room temperature.
Season with kosher salt and pepper on all sides.
Add canola oil to a large pan on high heat.
Once the oil is hot, add the tenderloin.
Without moving the tenderloin, cook until a dark brown crust forms, about 3 minutes.
Repeat searing on all sides, including the tenderloin ends.
Remove the tenderloin from the pan and transfer to a cutting board or wire rack and remove ties.
Brush the mustard on all sides of the meat while it’s still warm.
Let the meat rest for while making the duxelle (mushrooms cooked and reduced until dry).
To the same pan, add the butter, mushrooms, minced shallot, and minced garlic over medium heat.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until all the liquid evaporates and the mushroom mixture becomes a thick, dry-like paste.
Remove the mushrooms from the pan and let cool completely.
Place a large layer of overlapping sheets of plastic wrap on your work surface that is twice the length and width of the tenderloin.
Lay overlapping strips of prosciutto on the plastic into an even square layer.
Spread a layer of the mushrooms evenly over the prosciutto.
Tightly and evenly wrap the tenderloin with the prosciutto, using the plastic wrap to wrap it even tighter and seal ends.
Tie the ends of the plastic wrap together to hold the Wellington’s shape.
Place in the refrigerator for 15 minutes.
Place a new layer of plastic wrap on the work surface and lay a sheet of puff pastry over it.
Unwrap the prosciutto-wrapped beef tenderloin onto the puff pastry, wrapping until the ends meet.
Cut off any extra puff pastry, making sure there is no overlap.
Wrap the puff pastry in plastic wrap, tying the ends together to form a log shape.
Place in the refrigerator for 15 minutes.
Place the beef Wellington on a greased, parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
Brush the surface with the beaten eggs.
With a fork, score a decorative design onto the surface of the puff pastry.
Decorate with additional pastry (optional).
Sprinkle with kosher salt.
Bake for 40 minutes or until the puff pastry is a dark golden brown and the internal temperature of the beef is 135°F (57°C) for medium-rare.

title: Seven-Layer Dip Cups

ingredients.text: ½ cup ; green onion, chopped ; (50 g)

steps.text: Preheat oven to 350ºF (180ºC).
Cut flour tortillas into large squares and then divide each into quarters, making 4 smaller equally sized square pieces, per flour tortilla.
Generously coat a standard-size muffin tin with nonstick cooking spray.
Line each cup of prepared muffin tin with a tortilla sheet.
Spoon a tablespoon of refried beans into each sheet.
Sprinkle shredded cheese over each sheet.
Place another sheet on top of the bean/cheese mixture and press so it flattens.
Bake for 15 minutes.
Spoon in a tablespoon of guacamole, sour cream, and salsa into each cup then top with green onions and tomato.

description: Layers of creamy refried beans, tangy salsa, fresh guacamole, and more are piled high in individual cups for an easy-to-eat party appetizer.
fun_facts: The seven-layer dip is also known as Mexican dip or Tex-Mex dip.
The seven layers typically represent the colors of the Mexican flag.
Seven-layer dip was first popularized in the United States in the 1980s.
tips: Use a piping bag or a ziplock bag with the corner cut off to easily layer the ingredients in the cups.
Serve with tortilla chips for dipping.
Make sure to refrigerate the dip cups before serving to allow the flavors to meld together.
positive_statement: By making these Seven-Layer Dip Cups, you'll impress your guests with a delicious and visually appealing appetizer.
summary: These Seven-Layer Dip Cups are a crowd-pleasing vegetarian and gluten-free party appetizer. With layers of creamy refried beans, tangy salsa, fresh guacamole, and more, these easy-to-eat cups are sure to be a hit. Serve with tortilla chips for dipping and refrigerate before serving for the best flavor.

title: Giant Peanut Butter Cup

ingredients.text: 4 cups ; milk chocolate chips, divided ; (700 g)

steps.text: In a small bowl, place half of the chocolate chips.
Melt in the microwave in 30 second intervals, stirring in between, until fully melted.
Pour melted chocolate into a 10-inch (25 ½ cm) tart pan making sure to coat the entire pan, including all sides.
Refrigerate until set.
In a large bowl, place the peanut butter, powdered sugar, and softened butter and mix until smooth.
Pour the peanut butter into the tart pan and smooth the surface.
Melt remaining chocolate and pour over the peanut butter.
Smooth out the chocolate making sure it covers the entire surface.
Refrigerate until set, about 1 hour.
Slice and serve.

description: This massive treat is made with creamy peanut butter filling surrounded by a decadent layer of chocolate. Perfect for sharing with friends or indulging in on your own.
fun_facts: Peanut butter cups were invented in the 1920s.
The largest peanut butter cup ever made weighed over 2300 pounds.
Peanut butter cups are a popular Halloween candy.
tips: Use a silicone mold for easy removal of the giant peanut butter cup.
Refrigerate the peanut butter filling before adding the chocolate layer for easier assembly.
Drizzle melted chocolate on top for a decorative touch.
positive_statement: By making this giant peanut butter cup, you'll impress your friends and satisfy your sweet tooth!
summary: This giant peanut butter cup recipe is an easy and delicious dessert option. With a creamy peanut butter filling and a rich chocolate layer, it's a treat that everyone will love. The recipe includes 11 simple steps and requires ingredients like powdered sugar, milk chocolate chips, butter, and creamy peanut butter. Enjoy this indulgent dessert for any occasion!

title: Cheesy French Pull-apart Bread

ingredients.text: 2 cups ; white chedder, grated, or comte cheese ; (200 g)
4 ½ cups ; low-moisture mozzarella, cut into about twenty pieces ; (500 g)

steps.text: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
Cut the bread diagonally to form diamond shapes, making sure not to cut all the way down to the base of the bread.
Place the pieces of white cheddar between cuts.
Cover with shredded mozzarella.
Sprinkle salt, pepper, parsley, and melted butter on top.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until all the cheese is melted and the bread is lightly toasted.

description: This cheesy French pull-apart bread is the ultimate appetizer that's sure to impress.
fun_facts: Pull-apart bread is also known as monkey bread.
Cheese was first made in France over 2,000 years ago.
The French consume over 25 kilograms of cheese per person each year.
tips: Use a serrated knife to easily cut the bread into layers.
For extra flavor, sprinkle some garlic powder on top before baking.
Serve the bread warm for the best gooey cheese experience.
positive_statement: By making this cheesy French pull-apart bread, you'll impress your friends with a delicious and visually appealing appetizer.
summary: This cheesy French pull-apart bread is a crowd-pleasing appetizer with layers of flaky bread and gooey cheese. With a rating of over 3.5, it's easy to make in 7 steps using whole wheat bread, parsley, salt, white cheddar, pepper, low-moisture mozzarella, and butter. Enjoy the fun facts about cheese and the useful tips to enhance your baking experience.

title: Easy Flap Steak

steps.text: Add the steak, soy sauce, pepper, and garlic to a ziplock bag.
Remove air from the bag, seal, and rub steak in marinade.
Marinate for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat a medium-sized pan on high heat.
Remove steak from marinade and pat dry.
Coat pan with canola oil and add in steak.
Cook on high heat, flipping the steak frequently until the internal temperature registers 135˚F (57˚C).
Let rest for 5 minutes until cutting.
Cut and serve.

description: Savor the tenderness of this Easy Flap Steak, grilled to perfection and bursting with flavor.
fun_facts: Flap steak is also known as sirloin tip steak.
Grilling flap steak enhances its natural flavors.
Flap steak is a popular choice for fajitas.
tips: Marinate the flap steak for at least 30 minutes to enhance its tenderness.
Let the flap steak rest for a few minutes before slicing to retain its juices.
For a smoky flavor, grill the flap steak over charcoal.
positive_statement: By choosing to make this Easy Flap Steak, you'll enjoy a tender and flavorful dish that will impress your friends and family.
summary: This Easy Flap Steak recipe is perfect for a quick weeknight dinner or a backyard BBQ with friends. It has a rating of 5 stars and requires 10 steps. The ingredients needed are pepper, garlic, soy sauce, canola oil, and flap steak.

title: Homemade Cashew "Cheese"

steps.text: In a blender, combine the cashews, salt, onion powder, garlic powder, nutritional yeast, lemon juice, and 1 cup (235 ml) of water.
Blend for 1 minute, until very smooth.
In a small pot, bring the remaining water to a boil over medium heat.
Slowly add the agar-agar flakes while whisking continuously.
Continue to whisk the mixture until thick, about 2 minutes.
Allow the mixture to cool until the steam evaporates, then add to the blender with the other ingredients.
Blend for 1 minute, until smooth.
Pour the mixture into a medium bowl and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or until thickened.
When ready to serve, invert the cashew cheese onto a plate.
Slice or mash into cashew cheese spread and serve.

description: This Homemade Cashew Cheese is a delicious vegan alternative to traditional cheese, made with just a few simple ingredients including cashews, nutritional yeast, and lemon juice.
fun_facts: Cashews are actually seeds, not nuts.
Nutritional yeast is a great source of B vitamins.
Agar-agar is a plant-based alternative to gelatin.
tips: Soak the cashews in water overnight for a smoother texture.
Adjust the amount of nutritional yeast to suit your taste.
Store the cashew cheese in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
positive_statement: By choosing to make this Homemade Cashew Cheese, you are opting for a delicious vegan alternative that is both healthy and cruelty-free.
summary: This Homemade Cashew Cheese recipe is rated highly by users and consists of 11 easy steps. It requires ingredients like garlic powder, sea salt, nutritional yeast flakes, water, lemon juice, raw cashew, onion powder, and agar-agar flakes. Fun facts about this recipe include the fact that cashews are actually seeds, not nuts, and that nutritional yeast is a great source of B vitamins. Useful tips for making this cashew cheese include soaking the cashews overnight for a smoother texture, adjusting the amount of nutritional yeast to suit your taste, and storing the cheese in an airtight container in the refrigerator.

title: One Pot Cajun Chicken & Rice

ingredients.text: cajun spice, to taste, extra for seasoning chicken

steps.text: Rub chicken breasts with olive oil and then the cajun spice mix (store-bought or homemade)
Sear the chicken breasts on each side for about 2 minutes, then remove from the pan.
Add some more oil and fry the onions and peppers until softened.
Add the black beans and fry for a couple of minutes.
Add the rice and fry for a further minute.
Place the chicken back on and cover in chopped tomatoes.
Add chicken stock and more cajun spice (to taste).
Bring to boil, then cover and simmer for 25 minutes.

description: This hearty one-pot meal combines juicy chicken, spicy andouille sausage, and flavorful rice for a filling and satisfying dish.
fun_facts: Cajun cuisine originated from the French-speaking Acadian people who were deported from Canada to Louisiana.
Andouille sausage is a smoked sausage made using pork, garlic, pepper, and other spices.
Cajun seasoning typically includes a blend of spices like paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, and onion salt.
tips: To add extra heat, increase the amount of cayenne pepper in the Cajun spice mix.
For a vegetarian version, substitute the chicken and sausage with vegetables like bell peppers, zucchini, and mushrooms.
Make sure to rinse the rice before cooking to remove excess starch and prevent it from becoming sticky.
positive_statement: By choosing to make this One Pot Cajun Chicken & Rice, you'll enjoy a flavorful and satisfying meal that combines juicy chicken, spicy sausage, and aromatic rice.
summary: One Pot Cajun Chicken & Rice is a delicious and spicy dish that combines juicy chicken, flavorful andouille sausage, and aromatic rice. With its Cajun seasoning and one-pot cooking method, it's a convenient and satisfying meal option. The recipe includes 9 steps and features ingredients like Cajun spice, chicken breasts, and rice. Enjoy this hearty and flavorful dish!

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies

steps.text: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a large bowl, whisk together the brown sugar, granulated sugar, and melted butter, until evenly combined and light in color.
Add in the eggs and vanilla, mixing until smooth.
Add the flour and baking soda, folding the mixture until it forms a smooth dough.
Fold in the chocolate chips until evenly combined.
Using an ice cream scoop, scoop 6 balls of dough onto a baking tray lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 12 minutes, then serve!
To save cookie dough for later use, scoop the dough into balls and place them side-by-side on a baking tray lined with parchment paper.
Wrap the tray with cling wrap, then freeze for up to one month.
To bake the frozen dough balls, remove desired number from the tray and bake in a preheated oven for 15 minutes at 375°F (190°C).

description: Crispy on the edges and chewy in the middle, these classic chocolate chip cookies are the perfect treat for any occasion.
fun_facts: Chocolate chip cookies were invented by Ruth Graves Wakefield in 1938.
The largest chocolate chip cookie ever made weighed over 40,000 pounds.
The Toll House Inn, where the chocolate chip cookie was created, is now a museum.
tips: Use room temperature butter for a better texture.
Chill the dough for at least 30 minutes before baking for thicker cookies.
Add a pinch of salt to enhance the flavor of the cookies.
positive_statement: By making these delicious chocolate chip cookies, you'll be rewarded with a mouthwatering treat that everyone will love!
summary: This recipe for chocolate chip cookies has a rating of 5 stars and consists of 11 easy-to-follow steps. With ingredients like granulated sugar, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, and chocolate chips, you'll create a batch of crispy and chewy cookies that will satisfy any sweet tooth.

title: Peach Sorbet

steps.text: Blend all ingredients in a food processor or high-speed blender until thoroughly combined.
Pour into a rectangular loaf pan and smooth into an even layer.
Freeze for 2 hours, or until frozen but still a little soft for scooping.
(If freezing overnight, cover with a lid or plastic wrap, but let it sit out at room temperature for about 5-10 minutes before scooping.)
Scoop into a bowl.

description: Delight in the velvety sweetness of peach sorbet, a frozen treat that captures the essence of summer.

Sorbet is a dairy-free frozen dessert.
Peaches are believed to have originated in China over 2,000 years ago.
tips: For a smoother sorbet, blend the frozen peaches with a little bit of water before adding honey.
To enhance the flavor, add a splash of lemon juice to the sorbet mixture.
To serve the sorbet, use chilled bowls or glasses to keep it from melting too quickly.
positive_statement: By making this peach sorbet, you'll be treating yourself to a refreshing and healthy dessert that captures the taste of summer!

title: Sweet Potato "Fried" Rice

ingredients.text: 2 ; medium-sized sweet potatoes, peeled and chopped
1 tablespoon ; cooking oil, of preference, or water

steps.text: In a food processor, pulse the sweet potato chunks until they reach your desired “rice” consistency.
In a large skillet over medium heat, heat oil, then add onions and let cook until translucent.
Add sweet potato rice, carrots, salt, pepper, and vegetable broth and cook until the liquid has evaporated and the sweet potato is tender, stirring occasionally.
Add peas, eggs, and soy sauce, and combine, allowing it to heat through.
Garnish with green onions.

fun_facts: Sweet potatoes are a great source of vitamin A and fiber.
Carrots are rich in antioxidants and promote healthy skin.

Make sure to cook the eggs thoroughly before adding them to the fried rice.
Feel free to customize the recipe by adding your favorite vegetables or protein.

title: Pineapple Punch

steps.text: Put frozen pineapple, banana, coconut milk, orange juice, and water into blender and blend until smooth.
Serve over ice.

To make it a cocktail, add a splash of rum or vodka.

title: Paloma

ingredients.text: 1 oz ; grapefruit peel simple syrup ; (30 mL)
2 ; grapefruits, quartered and squeezed, juice reserved for another use

steps.text: In a medium bowl, combine the grapefruit rinds and sugar.
Toss to coat the rinds with the sugar, then cover.
Let sit, stirring every 45 minutes, for about 4 hours, or until the sugar is completely dissolved and there’s syrup in the bottom of the bowl.
Strain the syrup through a fine-mesh sieve or cheesecloth, pushing to extract as much syrup as possible.
Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 weeks.
In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine the tequila, lime juice, and simple syrup.
Shake vigorously for 20 seconds.
Strain into a glass filled with ice and top with club soda.
Garnish with the grapefruit wedge.

description: A refreshing and citrusy cocktail made with grapefruit, lime juice, tequila, and club soda.
fun_facts: The Paloma is one of Mexico's most popular cocktails.
The name 'Paloma' means 'dove' in Spanish.
The Paloma is often served on the rocks with a salt rim.
tips: For a sweeter Paloma, add more grapefruit peel simple syrup.
To make a mocktail version, simply omit the tequila.
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge for an extra touch of citrus.
positive_statement: By choosing to make a Paloma, you're in for a refreshing and delightful cocktail experience.
summary: The Paloma is a popular Mexican cocktail that combines the flavors of grapefruit, lime, and tequila. It is easy to make and perfect for any occasion. With its refreshing taste and simple ingredients, it's no wonder the Paloma is loved by many. Cheers to a delicious cocktail!

title: Winter Vegetable Chili

ingredients.text: ¼ cup ; fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for garnish ; (10 g)
2 cups ; parsnip, peeled and diced ; (450 g)
3 cups ; butternut squash, peeled and diced ; (615 g)

steps.text: In a large, heavy-bottomed pot, heat a drizzle of olive oil over medium heat.
Add the onion, season with salt, and cook until the onion starts to sweat and become translucent, 3 minutes.
Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, 2 minutes more.
Add the parsnips and butternut squash and season with salt, paprika, oregano, cumin, allspice, and chipotle powder.
Stir to coat the vegetables with the spices.
Cover and cook for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking, until the vegetables begin to soften.
Add the cannellini beans, cilantro, and vegetable broth.
Increase the heat to medium-high and bring to a boil for 2 minutes.
Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 15 minutes, until the chili is thickened and the vegetables are cooked through.
Ladle the chili into bowls and top with cilantro and cheddar cheese.

description: Get cozy with a steaming bowl of chili that will warm you up from the inside out.
fun_facts: Chili con carne is the official dish of the U.S. state of Texas.
Chili peppers were first cultivated in Central and South America over 6,000 years ago.
The word 'chili' comes from the Nahuatl language, spoken by the Aztecs.
tips: For a spicier kick, add more chipotle powder or a diced jalapeno pepper.
Serve the chili with a side of cornbread or warm crusty bread for a complete meal.
Leftover chili can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 3 days or frozen for longer storage.
positive_statement: By making this Winter Vegetable Chili, you're treating yourself to a delicious and nutritious meal that will warm your soul.
summary: This Winter Vegetable Chili is a comforting and nutritious meal loaded with hearty vegetables and simmered in a flavorful tomato base. Enjoy the leftovers for up to 3 days or freeze for longer storage.

title: Blueberry Banana Pancakes

steps.text: In a large bowl, mash the bananas until they reach a liquid state.
Whisk in the eggs.
Heat butter or oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Pour batter into the warm skillet to cook.
Garnish with desired number of blueberries.
After about a minute and a half (or until golden) flip to finish cooking.
Allow to cool for a minute.
Serve warm.

description: Start your day off right with these amazing pancakes! Packed with fresh blueberries and sweet bananas, these pancakes are a breakfast dream come true.
fun_facts: Blueberries are packed with antioxidants and are known to improve brain function.

tips: To make fluffy pancakes, separate the egg whites and beat them until stiff peaks form before folding them into the batter.
For extra flavor, add a teaspoon of vanilla extract to the pancake batter.
To prevent the blueberries from sinking to the bottom of the pancakes, toss them in a little flour before adding them to the batter.
positive_statement: By choosing to make these Blueberry Banana Pancakes, you're treating yourself to a delicious and nutritious breakfast!

title: Honey Barbecue Sauce

ingredients.text: 2 cups ; ketchup, homemade or store-bought ; (480 g)

steps.text: In a large, shallow saucepan, combine the onion, garlic, and water.
Cook over medium heat until the onion is translucent and softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the ketchup, apple cider vinegar, honey, and mustard powder.
Continue cooking for 20 minutes, until the sauce is thickened.
Season with salt and pepper.
Remove the pan from the heat.
Using an immersion blender, puree the sauce until smooth.
Let cool completely, about 25 minutes.
Transfer to a clean airtight container and store in the refrigerator.
The barbecue sauce will keep for up to 4 days.

description: The perfect balance of tangy, smoky, and sweet flavors, this sauce will elevate your grilled meats and add a finger-licking deliciousness to your dishes.
fun_facts: Barbecue sauce is believed to have originated in the Caribbean and was brought to the United States by European settlers.
Honey is a natural sweetener that adds depth and complexity to barbecue sauce.
Barbecue sauce can be traced back to ancient civilizations, such as the Chinese and Romans, who used similar sauces for their grilled meats.
tips: For a spicier kick, add a dash of cayenne pepper to the sauce.
To enhance the smoky flavor, try using smoked paprika instead of regular paprika.
For a thicker sauce, simmer it on low heat for a longer period of time.
positive_statement: By making this honey barbecue sauce, you'll impress your guests with its irresistible flavors and elevate your grilling game.
summary: This honey barbecue sauce recipe is a crowd-pleaser, perfect for grilling ribs or brushing on chicken. With its tangy, smoky, and sweet flavors, it's sure to impress. Try adding a dash of cayenne pepper for some heat or simmering it longer for a thicker consistency.

title: Green Machine Juice

steps.text: Add the cucumber, apple, celery, lemon juice, ginger, and kale to a blender, and blend until smooth.
Using a mesh strainer, strain the juice over a large liquid measuring cup to remove the pulp.
Use a spoon to help stir the pulp and press out the liquid.
Reserve the pulp to make pulp muffins.
Chill the juice for at least 30 minutes (and keep up to 3 days).

description: Get your daily dose of greens with this invigorating juice.
fun_facts: Kale is one of the most nutrient-dense foods on the planet.
Ginger has anti-inflammatory properties and can aid digestion.
Green apples are a great source of fiber and vitamin C.
tips: To make the juice smoother, remove the seeds from the cucumber.
Add a pinch of salt to enhance the flavors of the juice.
For a sweeter taste, add a teaspoon of honey or maple syrup.
positive_statement: Choosing to make this Green Machine Juice will leave you feeling energized and refreshed!
summary: This Green Machine Juice is a healthy and refreshing option, perfect for a quick and easy detox. With a rating of over 3.5, it's packed with nutritious ingredients like kale, spinach, and ginger. Follow the 6 simple steps to enjoy this low-calorie, vegan, and gluten-free juice.

title: Chicken Parm Strips

ingredients.text: ½ cup ; grated parmesan cheese ; (50 g)

steps.text: Preheat oven to 325°F (190°C).
Cut the chicken into strips.
In one medium-sized bowl, mix the bread crumbs, parmesan, salt, and pepper.
In another bowl, crack the eggs and whisk until scrambled.
Coat the chicken in the egg, then in the bread crumbs, then repeat.
Place the chicken tenders on a baking tray and bake for 20 minutes, flipping halfway through.
Sprinkle each tender with mozzarella and bake again for 5 more minutes, or until cheese is melted.
Serve with marinara.

description: These crispy chicken strips are a fun twist on classic chicken parm.
fun_facts: Chicken Parmesan is also known as Chicken Parmigiana.
Chicken Parmesan is a popular Italian-American dish.
Chicken Parmesan is often served with pasta or a side of vegetables.
tips: To make the chicken strips extra crispy, double coat them in the breadcrumb mixture.
Serve the chicken strips with a side of marinara sauce for dipping.
For a healthier option, you can bake the chicken strips instead of frying them.

Heat oil over a nonstick pan and add chicken stirring until cooked.

title: Black Bean Brownies

ingredients.text: 1 can ; black beans, drained and rinsed instead of flour
¼ cup ; unsweetened cocoa powder ; (30 g)
½ cup ; dark chocolate chip ; (85 g)

Add black beans to a food processor and pulse until blended.
Add eggs, baking powder, unsweetened cocoa powder, coconut oil, maple syrup, and vanilla extract.

Spray loaf pan with cooking spray or wipe down with oil.

Spread the mayonnaise over 1 slice of toast.
Spread the avocado on top, then add the cucumber slices and tomato slice.

title: Carrot Cake

ingredients.text: 12 oz ; cream cheese, room temperature ; (340 g)
1 cup ; unsalted butter, (2 sticks) room temperature ; (225 g)
1 cup ; light brown sugar, packed ; (200 g)
2 ½ cups ; all-purpose flour, plus 1 tablespoon, divided ; (310 g)

steps.text: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
Grease 3 8-inch (20 cm) round cake pans and line with parchment paper.
Grate the carrots on the small holes of a box grater.
Set aside.
In a large bowl, sift together 2½ cups (310 G) of flour, the cinnamon, allspice, salt, baking powder, and baking soda.
Whisk together.
In a separate large bowl, beat the brown sugar, granulated sugar, and eggs together with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until just combined.
With the mixer running, gradually pour in the vegetable oil.
With the mixer on medium-low speed, add ⅓ of the flour mixture at a time to the wet ingredients.
Beat just to incorporate.
Stop mixing when there is just a small amount of flour visible.
In a small bowl, toss the raisins with the remaining tablespoon of flour.
Add the raisin, grated carrots, and pineapple to the batter and fold to incorporate with a rubber spatula.
Divide the cake batter evenly between the prepared pans and smooth the tops.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, until a fork inserted in the center of a cake comes out clean.
Cool the cakes on a wire rack until the pans are cool to the touch.
Remove the cakes from the pans and let cool completely on the rack.
Make the icing: In a large bowl, beat together the butter, cream cheese, and vanilla with an electric hand mixer on medium-low speed.
Once combined, mix on medium-high speed for 30 seconds, until light and fluffy.
Add the powdered sugar, ½ cup (60 G) at a time, beating on medium-low speed to incorporate each addition.
Assemble the cake: Check to see if the top of each cake is flat.
If not, use a serrated knife level off the cakes.
Place 1 cake layer on a serving platter or cake stand.
Spoon ¼ of the icing on top and spread in an even layer.
Add another layer of cake and spread with another ¼ of the icing.
Set the last cake layer on top with the bottom up to ensure a very flat surface.
Spread the rest of the icing over the top and sides.
Gently press the walnuts into the icing around the sides of the cake.
Chill for 30-60 minutes to let the icing set, then slice and serve.

Slice fruit of choice into long pieces.
*Note: Use a potato peeler to shave thin slices off the mango.
Lay a bamboo rolling pad on a counter top, and place a square of wax paper over top.
Spread the rice about ½ inch (1 cm) thick over the paper into approximately a 7x5 inch (17x12 cm) rectangle.
Toast a ¼ cup (25g) of coconut shreds for 3 minutes.
Lay the fruit pieces on the rice, and roll up carefully.
If rice sticks to the paper too much, try spreading it a little thicker.
Coat the rolls with either the mango slices, or the toasted coconut.
Slice each roll into 6 pieces.
With the rest of the rice, roll into balls (like nigiri).
Place thin slices of kiki or strawberries over top with half a blackberry on top to look like fish eggs.
Blend ¼ cup (25 g) raspberries with ¼ cup (60 ml) water to make a dipping sauce.

description: Take a bite of summer with this fun and creative twist on sushi!
fun_facts: Coconut milk is a great source of healthy fats and can help improve digestion.
Raspberries are packed with antioxidants and are known to boost immune function.
Kiwi is one of the most nutrient-dense fruits, containing high levels of vitamin C, vitamin K, and fiber.
tips: Make sure to rinse the rice thoroughly before cooking to remove excess starch.
Use a sharp knife to cut the fruits into small, bite-sized pieces for easier rolling.
To prevent the rice from sticking to your hands, wet them with water before handling.
positive_statement: By making this fresh fruit sushi, you'll be treating yourself to a delicious and healthy dessert that will impress your friends and family!
summary: Fresh Fruit Sushi is a delightful dessert option that combines sweet and juicy fruits with sticky coconut rice. With its easy preparation and vegetarian ingredients, it is perfect for any occasion. The recipe includes 18 steps and features a variety of fruits such as raspberry, strawberry, blackberry, mango, kiwi, and pineapple. Enjoy this refreshing and colorful treat!
related: Berry Parfait with Yogurt and Granola

title: Banana Chocolate Chip Pancakes

steps.text: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C).
Pour pancake mix, milk, and eggs into a bowl and mix just until combined.
Pour batter onto a parchment-lined baking sheet and spread to the edges.
Place banana slices on top of the batter, followed by the chocolate chips.
Bake for 15 minutes, or until golden brown.
Cut into squares and serve immediately, or freeze up to 1 month.
To reheat, place on a microwave-safe plate and heat for 20 seconds per pancake on the plate.

description: Get your pancake fix with these banana chocolate chip flapjacks that are a perfect combination of fluffy and moist, with the added sweetness of chocolate and banana.
fun_facts: Bananas are technically berries.
Chocolate chips were invented in 1937.
Pancakes are a popular breakfast food worldwide.
tips: Use ripe bananas for a sweeter flavor.
Fold the chocolate chips into the batter gently to prevent them from sinking to the bottom.
Serve the pancakes with a drizzle of maple syrup and extra chocolate chips on top.
positive_statement: By making these delicious banana chocolate chip pancakes, you'll be treating yourself to a delightful breakfast or dessert.
summary: These mouthwatering banana chocolate chip pancakes are a crowd-pleasing breakfast or dessert option. With a fluffy and moist texture, they are made with ripe bananas, chocolate chips, and a pancake mix. Serve them with a drizzle of maple syrup and extra chocolate chips for an extra indulgence. Enjoy this easy and delicious recipe!
